title: Font from Commonwealth Utilities fashion campaign
content:
Help! Looks like an extended Interstate, or Gotham. Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_0687.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103149/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0687.JPG) | 851.71 KB |
author: brianj1400

comments.content:
The amount of closure of the C is a good clue to finding this. I don't think either of your candidates would be very close. It's possible it was graphically widened/flattened, but if not either Engravers Gothic or [Aviano Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009103149/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/aviano-sans/) might be close.

- Mike Yanega

_... might be close._

... or ITC Blair or Akzidenz Grotesk Extended.
